itemDescription: Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: Lewis Reece (born 17 June 1991) is a Welsh professional rugby league footballer who plays at Second-row, Centre, Wing, Fullback for West Wales Raiders in the Betfred Championship

response: He was also the brother of Welsh boxer Leonard "Luggie" Reece, and Grandfather of Welsh Rugby League International Lewis Reece.
* Lewis Reece - South Wales Scorpions & Wales rugby league international
|  South Wales Scorpions || Aled James, Andrew Gay, Ashley Bateman, Christiaan Roets, Geraint Davies, Joe Burke, Lewis Reece, Steve Parry

*On 9 October, John Kear brought in four new players to the team to add to his train-on squad after withdrawals from Garreth Carvell and Rob Massam. Carvell withdrew due to injury while Massam cited work commitments. The four new players Kear brought in are: Tom Hughes, Morgan Evans, Lewis Reece and Owain Griffiths.
